title: Peter Crouch relives the moment he first met wife Abbey Clancey and the argument they had
text:

Peter Crouch has opened up about the night he first met his wife, Abbey Clancy, 14 years ago.

The couple married in 2016 and they have four children together - Sophia, eight, Liberty, four, Johnny, 20 months, and baby Jack, who was born in June.

Peter, 38, recounted the moment he met wife Abbey, 33, in a bar – “she went mental” because he started talking to another woman after she “amazingly” gave him her number.

(Image: BBC)

(Image: BBC)

He was on The Chris Moyles Show on Radio X this morning where he also revealed Abbey has “no interest whatsoever” in reading his books .

Chris asked Peter about meeting Abbey, and he explained that he met her in a bar, and thought she was out of his league.

"I was nothing, you know, there was nothing amazing about it", he said.

Before hastily adding: "Apart from the fact we met, that was amazing."

(Image: BBC)

The two swapped numbers, but Peter ended up in trouble with her for speaking to another woman later in the night.

"We got on fantastically well", he said.

"She gave me her number – amazingly – she went away and I just carried on with my evening, and I should have known then, but I was talking to someone else who was also female.

"She came over and said ‘Look at you! Who do you think you are?’ as if we were married already.

(Image: Sunday Mirror)

"She went mental! And I was like ‘I’m only talking’. I should have known then!"

Peter said that Abbey would not read his book because she is too busy, but she as furious that he didn't mention her enough in his first book.

Chris said: "I love the first bit of the book which is your dedication to Abbey which says ‘to my beautiful wife Abbey, who will only read this page of the book’."

I mean that’s the only one she read of the last book, and because I mentioned her last, she was fuming. She said “how dare you, your accountant got a mention before me!” So she was fuming, so I said, you know, I dedicated this one solely to her.

(Image: Brett D. Cove / Splash News)

Peter replied: "I mean that’s the only one she read of the last book, and because I mentioned her last, she was fuming.

"She said “how dare you, your accountant got a mention before me!”

"So she was fuming, so I said, you know, I dedicated this one solely to her."

"Well let’s just see if we can get her to read at least one chapter", said Chris,

(Image: Getty Images Europe)

"She won’t. No interest whatsoever. She’s a busy girl", said Peter.

The striker also laughed about still believing his wife is out of his league now.

"Yeah I’ve pulled the wool over her eyes for 14 years!", he said.

"Like a magician! It’s a strange thing yeah, one of the wonders of the world!"

*Tune into The Chris Moyles Show on Radio X, week days from 6:30am – 10am and Saturdays from 8am – 11am
description: The footballer talked about meeting wife Abbey and why she has no interest in reading his new book
